sentence.Network_en: I didn't see that my career as a film-maker was going anywhere.

sentence.Network_en: Andrew went rigid when he saw a dog, any dog, anywhere.
sentence.Network_cn: 安德鲁过去只要看见狗，无论在哪里，无论什么狗，都会吓得一动不动。

sentence.Network_en: You can go anywhere and still the compass points north or south.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论走到哪里，罗盘仍然指向北或南。

lj.lj_ly: I wouldn't dream of letting a surgeon anywhere near my eyes.
lj.lj_ls: 我决不会让外科大夫靠近我的眼睛的。

encyclopedia.content: 仓木麻衣34th SL的C/W曲 是来自日本最著名的歌手之一。Kuraki自从看过一部关于MichaelJackson的生活电影和惠特尼休斯顿的音乐会后就梦想成为一名歌手。自99年「Love,DayAfterTomorror」后推出的「DeliciousWay」，获得了2000年度细碟销量冠军、大碟销量亚军、最佳作词、最出色新人奖和最高唱片收入亚军等五个奖项，并打破了原来的R&B小天后宇多田光的纪录，和滨崎步并列第一（总销量第二），出道不到一年就被公认为唯一可以威胁另外两大天后的新天后。

entry.tran: （用于否定句）哪儿，到处（都没有）
entry.def: You use anywhere in statements with negative meaning to indicate that a place does not exist.

example.ex: I haven't got anywhere to live...
There had never been such a beautiful woman anywhere in the world.
example.tran: 世界上从未有过如此美丽的女人。

entry.tran: （用于疑问句和条件从句）某个地方，哪里
entry.def: You use anywhere in questions and conditional clauses to ask or talk about a place without saying exactly where you mean.

example.ex: Did you try to get help from anywhere?...
example.tran: 你尝试过从哪里寻求帮助吗？

example.ex: If she wanted to go anywhere at all she had to wait for her father to drive her.
example.tran: 她想去任何地方都只能等父亲开车送她去。

entry.tran: （用于描述所谈论的某个地方的词语前）…地方
entry.def: You use anywhere before words that indicate the kind of place you are talking about.

example.ex: In America most leisure-time activities are about a million times better than anywhere else...
example.tran: 美国大多数休闲娱乐活动比其他地方要丰富得多的多。

example.ex: He'll meet you anywhere you want...
example.tran: 他随你在哪儿见面都行。

entry.def: You use anywhere to refer to a place when you are emphasizing that it could be any of a large number of places.

example.ex: Rachel would have known Julia Stone anywhere.
example.tran: 甭管到哪儿，雷切尔都会认出朱莉娅·斯通。

example.ex: ...jokes that are so funny they always work anywhere.
example.tran: 屡试不爽的极为有趣的笑话

entry.def: When you do not want to be exact, you use anywhere to refer to a particular range of things.

example.ex: His shoes cost anywhere from $200 up...
example.tran: 他买的鞋子总在200美元以上。

example.ex: My visits lasted anywhere from three weeks to two months.
example.tran: 我每次逗留时间从3个星期到两个月不等。

entry.tran: （用于强调）根本，一点儿，将近，几乎
entry.def: You use anywhere in expressions such as anywhere near and anywhere close to to emphasize a statement that you are making.

example.ex: There weren't anywhere near enough empty boxes...
The only one who's anywhere close to the truth is my mother.
example.tran: 唯一算得上了解真相的人是我的母亲。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is not getting anywhere or is not going anywhere, you mean that they are not making progress or achieving a satisfactory result.

example.ex: The conversation did not seem to be getting anywhere...
example.tran: 会谈好像没有取得任何进展。

example.ex: I didn't see that my career as a film-maker was going anywhere.
example.tran: 我发现我作为电影制片人的职业没有什么发展前途。

means.word_mean: 1. at or in or to any place;

sentences.sentence: "you can find this food anywhere"; (`anyplace' is used informally for `anywhere')

means.word_mean: 无论何处, 在（或去）任何地方, 随便哪里

sentences.en: You can go anywhere you like.
sentences.cn: 你可以去任何你想去的地方。

jushi.english: He may go anywhere to escape:London,Paris, or wherever.
jushi.chinese: 他可能逃到任何地方:伦敦、巴黎或别的任何地方。

jushi.english: Did he lose it anywhere between his office and the post office?
jushi.chinese: 他在他的办公室和邮局之间的某处遗失了它吗?
